channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0127; 03:04AM; 2901 S Palm Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/47HFw5j; West Adams; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. Firefighters located an approximately 60yo female patient who was transported in critical condition. LAFD Arson responding for the investigation per protocol for serious injury. No further details. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E294 E34 E94 RA34 RA894 RA94 T26 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0127; 02:42AM; 2901 S Palm Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/47HFw5j; West Adams; Two story apartment over parking with fire showing from 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E294 E34 E94 RA894 RA94 T26 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Auto vs Ped; INC#1591; 07:15PM; 11036 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46ntwFg; Studio City; Auto versus pedestrian with the patient trapped under the vehicle. Firefighters quickly extricated and are transporting the adult male patient in *at least* serious condition. The original 9-1-1 was received at 7:04PM. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3917 for the investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1292; 04:15PM; 4326 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D6mBoJ; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 11 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters held the fire to one room in a unit on the 1st floor. No further details.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 E215 E226 E294 E34 E46 E94 RA34 RA834 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1292; 04:04PM; 4326 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D6mBoJ; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire in one unit on the 1st floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 E215 E226 E294 E34 E46 E94 RA34 RA834 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1081; 03:00PM; 1417 S Crest Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G6KcWy; Pico-Robertson; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 47 minutes with no injuries reported. Building type updated to a 3 story condo, two residential over parking. Preliminarily, appears the fire originated on the ground floor due to a pipe sweating operation and ran the walls to the top floor. Crews worked to systematically open sections of the wall on each floor to reveal all fire and smoldering spots and ensure full extinguishment. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 CM20 CM22 E261 E292 E43 E61 E94 RA43 RA826 T61 T92; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1081; 02:13PM; 1417 S Crest Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G6KcWy; Pico-Robertson; Three story modern style apartment building with heavy smoke showing from the 3rd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 E261 E292 E43 E61 E94 RA43 RA826 T61 T92; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0607; 10:31AM; 434 W Sepulveda St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G5RF8q; San Pedro; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E112 E248 E285 E36 E48 RA112 RA36 T48 T85; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0607; 10:14AM; 434 W Sepulveda St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G5RF8q; San Pedro; Two story, single family dwelling with moderate smoke showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E112 E248 E285 E36 E48 RA112 RA36 T48 T85; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0256; 06:08AM; 6417 S Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GaFyHj; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. Fortunately, despite the initial, unconfirmed reports of persons possibly inside the structure the search conducted by firefighters located no occupants. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 E57 RA21 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
